official_title: To provide for the preservation and enhancement of significant cultural, historical and architectural resources associated with the coal mining heritage of southern West Virginia, and for other purposes.
short_title: Southern West Virginia Heritage Preservation Act of 1990

summary.text: Southern West Virginia Heritage Preservation Act of 1990 - Title I: Southern West Virginia Heritage Preservation Commission - Establishes in the Department of the Interior the Southern West Virginia Heritage Preservation Commission to preserve the coal mining heritage of southern West Virginia. Authorizes appropriations. Title II: Southern West Virginia Coal Heritage Route - Requires the Secretary of the Interior to designate the Southern West Virginia Coal Heritage Route linking historical, cultural, and recreational sites in southern West Virginia. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Southern West Virginia Heritage Preservation Act of 1990

To provide for the preservation and enhancement of significant cultural, historical and architectural resources associated with the coal mining heritage of southern West Virginia, and for other purposes.
